head.title: The Makeup Update
head.description: In this update, we're adding features, and redesigning the UI!
head.author: Coderboy13

body.p: When this game was first built, it was just a simple project I created when I was bored. I had made it in a day or two, and hadn't put much effort into many parts of it. This meant a very ugly looking ui. However, in this update, this is one of the biggest things I set out to change!

The UI has been entirely redesigned from the ground up, with some actual thought and effort being put in to making it look nice, be adaptive, and be functional. I am not much of a UI person, and don't have too much experience in this area, so I did some research, and tried to create a decent looking UI to replace the bland and basic original system.

ul.li: Moved master branch to legacy branch
Merged rewrite branch to master branch
